snippet: Mitt Romney inadvertently offered a public preview of some of his economic plans, revealing at a private event that he wants to eliminate tax deductions for wealthy people with second homes.
abstract: Mitt Romney inadvertently offered a public preview of some of his economic plans, revealing at a private event that he wants to eliminate tax deductions for wealthy people with second homes.

headline.main: Romney Talks of Ending Some Tax Deductions for Wealthy
